numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The highest pay grades are 7 times the amount of acceptance to elite colleges if an applicant has a legacy at the college.
2. A legacy at a college means that someone has previously attended the college.
3. I wonder why the chances increase drastically after an applicant reaches the highest pay grades.
4. The data show the likelihood of acceptance to an elite college for an applicant with a legacy at the college.
5. The data also show the likelihood of acceptance to an elite college for an applicant without a legacy at the college.
